page.title: 02COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: Although there are 15 Sub Post Offices in{Kirkcaldy}the main one is in{Hunter Street. The{Post Office building}was built in the early 1900's and a former dance hall next door is now also part of the Post Office. The Post Office has{800-1000 {customers}a day mainly to collect pensions,buy licences etc.,and post letters and parcels.The most popular stamp for letters is the second class stamp mainly because it is cheaper. In 1984 the{letter sorting}was moved to Edinburgh,but{parcels}are still sorted in Kirkcaldy.65 people work in Kirkcaldy sorting office.47 of these are postmen. {The postmen}start their work at 5.30am.After they have sorted the mail for there own street they deliver the mail and finish work at 1.00p.m.
